mapper.sql:
FROM infrCodeGroup a WHERE 1=1
AND a.ifcgNameKor LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
AND a.ifcgDelNY = 0
AND a.ifcgDelNY = 1
AND a.ifcgRegDatetime BETWEEN date(#{shStartDate}) AND date(#{shEndDate})
AND a.ifcgModDatetime BETWEEN date(#{shStartDate}) AND date(#{shEndDate})
ORDER BY a.ifcgSeq ASC
ORDER BY a.ifcgRegDatetime ASC
ORDER BY a.ifcgModDatetime ASC
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.ifcgSeq ,a.ifcgNameEng ,a.ifcgNameKor ,a.ifcgRegDatetime ,a.ifcgModDatetime ,(select count(aa.ifccSeq) from infrCommonCode aa where aa.infrCodeGroup_ifcgSeq = a.ifcgSeq) as codeCnt ,a.ifcgUseNY ,a.ifcgDelNY
SELECT a.ifcgSeq ,a.ifcgNameEng ,a.ifcgNameKor ,a.ifcgUseNY ,a.ifcgDelNY ,a.ifcgRegDatetime ,a.ifcgModDatetime FROM infrCodeGroup a WHERE 1=1 AND #{ifcgSeq} = a.ifcgSeq
mapper.update:
UPDATE infrCodeGroup SET ifccDelNY = 1
WHERE ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
